mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM
AND clientName LIKE CONCAT( '%', '${clientName}', '%' ) AND company LIKE CONCAT( '%', '${company}', '%' ) AND link LIKE CONCAT( '%', '${link}', '%' ) AND status = #{status}
